Title: Unmanned Ripping Maching
Description: URM is an automation tool designed for use with the HTPC. It rips DVDs and encodes automatically behind the scenes.
HomeWiki:
Unmanned Ripping Machine

 

Unmanned Ripping Machine is an automation tool designed for use with the HTPC (Home Theater Personal Computer). It requires windows 8 or higher and runs with .net framework. It is also designed to replace your shell for windows as it works like a proxy for starting up your media system (Kodi, for example). 

 

You need to be sure to have MakeMKV, and Handbrake installed prior to configuring this system.
